fr.fastconnect.factory.tibco.bw.maven.compile

Class CompileEARMojo

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.maven.plugin.AbstractMojo
      • fr.fastconnect.factory.tibco.bw.maven.AbstractBWMojo
        • fr.fastconnect.factory.tibco.bw.maven.AbstractBWArtifactMojo
          • fr.fastconnect.factory.tibco.bw.maven.compile.CompileEARMojo
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.maven.plugin.ContextEnabled, org.apache.maven.plugin.Mojo

    @Mojo(name="compile-bw-ear",
      defaultPhase=COMPILE)
public class CompileEARMojo
extends AbstractBWArtifactMojo

    This goal creates a TIBCO BusinessWorks EAR based on the configuration given in the project's POM.

    The most important parameters are:

    • bw.project.archive.builder : the location of the Enterprise Archive file inside the TIBCO BusinessWorks project
    • bw.project.location : the TIBCO BusinessWorks sources location relatively to the POM

    Other parameters have default values set with the global values of "settings.xml" file.

      • execute

        public void execute()
             throws org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoExecutionException
        Description copied from class: AbstractBWMojo

        The execute method of this Mojo will :

        • check that the BusinessWorks project exists
        • copy the Designer5.prefs file
        • copy the .designtimelibs file useful for setting a TIBCO environment for the project being built.

        Specified by:
        execute in interface org.apache.maven.plugin.Mojo
        Overrides:
        execute in class AbstractBWArtifactMojo
        Throws:
        org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoExecutionException
